original_text: The rules in God's Law say this: ‘Do not have sex with anyone who is not your own wife or your own husband. Do not kill anyone. Do not rob anyone. Do not want things that belong to other people.’ All these rules, and all the other rules in God's Law, are all included in one rule. That one rule is: ‘Love other people as much as you love yourself.’
korean_text: 간음하지 말라, 살인하지 말라, 도둑질하지 말라, 탐내지 말라 한 것과 그 외에 다른 계명이 있을지라도 네 이웃을 네 자신과 같이 사랑하라 하신 그 말씀 가운데 다 들었느니라

sentences.original_text: The rules in God's Law say this:
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 율법에 있는 규칙들은 이렇게 말합니다:

sentences.original_text: 'Do not have sex with anyone who is not your own wife
sentences.korean_translation: '자신의 아내가 아닌 누구와도 성관계를 갖지 말고
자신의 남편이 아닌 누구와도 성관계를 갖지 말라.'

sentences.original_text: Do not want things that belong to other people.'
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람에게 속한 것들을 탐내지 말라.'

sentences.original_text: All these rules, and all the other rules in God's Law,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 규칙들과 하나님의 율법에 있는 다른 모든 규칙들은

sentences.original_text: are all included in one rule.
'Love other people as much as you love yourself.'
